quotes.msg: We both step and do not step in the same rivers. We are and are not.
quotes.context: Reality is change and flow. We step into and out of the river as different beings.

quotes.msg: Fall down seven, get up eight.
quotes.context: Falling down n times only requires getting up n times, of course.

quotes.msg: If you haven't failed it means you haven't tried hard enough.
quotes.context: Go above and beyond and do something new. To be safe means to be afraid of failing.
Everyone wants to strive for perfection, but never forget the end goal. Time is a finite resource.

quotes.msg: Most of the world will make decisions by either guessing or using their gut. They will be either lucky or wrong.
quotes.context: When we guess, we move forward without all of the information that we may need to be successful.
